meanings.sent1: Training can capacitate employees for new tasks.
meanings.sent2: Studying hard can capacitate students for success.
meanings.sent3: The superhero's special suit capacitated him to fly effortlessly.
meanings.sent4: Her encouraging words capacitated him to face his fears head-on.
meanings.sent5: The magical potion capacitated the wizard with immense strength.

meanings.sent1: The new technology will capacitate the team to work more efficiently.
meanings.sent2: Education can capacitate individuals to achieve their goals.
meanings.sent3: The talking parrot capacitated the pirate to have amusing conversations.
meanings.sent4: Kindness can capacitate people to spread positivity around them.
meanings.sent5: The wise advice capacitated her to make the right decision.

meanings.definition: To provide with the capacity to do something
meanings.sent1: Regular exercise can capacitate the body to endure physical challenges.
meanings.sent2: The workshop will capacitate participants with new skills.
meanings.sent3: The magic wand capacitated the rabbit to juggle colorful balls.
meanings.sent4: Music can capacitate the mind to appreciate different melodies.
meanings.sent5: The mentor's guidance capacitated him to navigate through difficult situations.
